Package org.qme.vis

Class QInputScreen

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
org.qme.vis.QInputScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class QInputScreen
extends javax.swing.JFrame
This class represents a screen. The main function is to handle input, but it also contains a QRenderScreen object inside it.
Since:
pre0
Author:
adamhutchings
See Also:
QRenderScreen, Serialized Form
